title: S3 Ep96: Behind Haunted Evidence w/Patrick Burns - Hr. 3
itunes:title: Behind Haunted Evidence w/Patrick Burns - Hr. 3
description: Patrick Burns of the Court TV/Tru TV series, Haunted Evidence, joins Darkness Radio to talk about the premise of the series, and the behind the scenes workings of the show as well in this fascinating look at this paranormal/true crime series.
itunes:author: Darkness Radio
dc:creator: Darkness Radio
